summary.span: 提供一個在指定活動範圍內建立唯一名稱識別項的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism to create uniquely named identifiers throughout a specified range of activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 提供一個在活動範圍內建立唯一名稱識別項的機制。 provides a mechanism to create uniquely named identifiers throughout a range of activities. ## Examples 下列範例將示範 的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the . 這個服務可確保目前工作流程中所使用的每一個識別項都是唯一的。This service ensures that each of the identifiers used within the current workflow is unique.
